site_name: A FRIEND TO ALL GOD'S CREATURES

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:50 p.m. on
11/12/2014.
Left message for licensee on answering machine.
